Underground Hygge

Orondo
Kristie
  • 2 guests
  • 1 bedroom
  • 1 bed
  • 1 bath

Entire home

You’ll have the earth house to yourself.

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the keypad.

Sparkling clean

14 recent guests said this place was sparkling clean.

Kristie is a Superhost

Superhosts are experienced, highly rated hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests.

This inspired dwelling nestled right into the breathtaking Columbia River Gorge mountainside. Reverently framed by the iconic round doorway, the wondrous views will entrance your imagination and inspire an unforgettable journey. Every nook of this little habitation will warm your sole, every cranny will charm your expedition of repose. Up the pathway, tucked into the earth, an unbelievable adventure awaits!

Read more about the space

Guest access

We have 6 acres to hike around & explore :)

Other things to note

There is a parking area at the bottom of the hill and a short but steep hike to the hobbit hole. It's just under a 100 yards and takes less than 5 mins if your physically able bodied. If you are not please look at the pictures to determine if you will be comfortable with the distance.

Booking in the winter you will need a 4 wheel drive vehicle. Snow is likely December - March.

Contact host

Show more
Jennifer
November 2019

This gem is even better than the pictures show. It is a marvel to consider how they did it. Do not hesitate to stay here. The town is cute, although it was hard to leave the Hobbit Hole. Also, for those of you travelling from Seattle, make sure you take Route 2 at least one way. It is slightly longer than taking 90, but it is such a beautiful drive. Plus the town of Levenworth is quite something. I won't reveal why to not ruin the surprise!

Emily
November 2019

Such a fun experience! Especially for a LOTR/ Hobbit fan! My sister came in from Alabama and was totally taken with the scenery and she felt like the house put her in the movie. Would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting a fun adventure for a night too. I had fun carving my owl. :)

Chase
November 2019

If you are a huge fan or a casual enthusiast of Lord of the Rings this is a must visit. I felt the same wonder and joy in my heart as I did when I first experienced Middle-earth when I was 12 years old. An absolute delight from start to finish, if a little bit off the beaten track.

Haley
November 2019

Beautiful view, thoughtful touches and peaceful atmosphere. We loved our stay!

Ramona
October 2019

We had a great time. It's so beautiful up in the mountains. You will love it!

Tyler
October 2019

This was a one-of-a-kind experience. The house was beautiful and cozy. The surrounding area is full of awesome hikes that offer stunning views. Wizards up, Goblins down.

Sarah
October 2019

We had such a great time at the Hobbit Inn! There is about a 10-15 gravel road drive up to the house so keep that in mind and make sure your car is one that can handle it. Once you park, there’s quite a few rugged steps up to the house which will get your heart pumping a little. But once you’re there, you’re in Hobbit paradise! So much thought went into the building of this place; it’s a must-do for LOTR fans!

Hosted by Kristie

Boise, ID · Joined in March 2014

  • 1358 Reviews
  • 4 References
  • Verified

Kristie is a Superhost · Superhosts are experienced, highly rated hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests.

I am a proud Idaho woman who is passionate about living simply. I hand built a tiny 97 sq ft home out of sustainable materials several years ago and still live there today. In the winter of 2013 / 2014 I fulfilled a life long dream of building my very own treehouse that now I get to share with ya'll.

Interaction with guests

I live in Boise, Idaho & run things from afar so I won't be at the property to meet you in person but you can contact me or my team anytime day or night.

Response rate: 100%
Response time: within an hour

Always communicate through Airbnb · To protect your payment, never transfer money or communicate outside the Airbnb website or app. Learn More

The Neighbourhood

Kristie’s place is located in Orondo , Washington, United States.

The majority of your neighbors will be deer, rabbits, birds & grouse. It's 2 miles up the mountain and although there are houses it gets more remote the closer you get to the hobbit hole.

Read more about the neighbourhood See guidebook

Exact location information is provided after a booking is confirmed.

Check-in:After 3PM
Checkout:11 AM

Cancellations

Free cancellation for 48 hours

After that, cancel up to 7 days before check-in and get a 50% refund, minus the service fee.
